title: Police in Atlanta Search for Felon After Gun Discharged at Airport
sub_head: Busy travel day interrupted after a loaded gun discharged, causing chaos
body:
Police are searching for a felon who fled the Atlanta airport after a loaded gun in his bag discharged Saturday, causing chaos on one of the busiest travel weekends since the pandemic began.
No one was shot, but three people needed medical assistance as a result of the chaos, according to the Atlanta Police Department, including a person who fell and two people who had shortness of breath.
